label: Cloaks
desc: The Cloak is an equipment item in Hollow Knight: Silksong.

items.label: Drifter's Cloak
items.description: The Seamstress in the Far Fields will sew an array of spines into Hornet's cloak as a reward for completing the Flexile Spines Wish. Hokers must be attacked in order to collect the 25 necessary Spine Cores.

items.label: Faydown Cloak
items.description: The Faydown Cloak can be acquired at the peak of Mount Fay, which involves a series of platforming challenges using the Clawline to cross large gaps, bounce off obstacles, and gain altitude, all while working under the time pressure from the mountain's freezing climate. Upon reaching the peak, Hornet must play her Needolin to call down a Fayforn that will grant her this item.

label: Keys
desc: Important keys used to unlock special areas and progress in Pharloom.

items.label: Simple Key #1
items.description: Bought from Pebb in Bonebottom.

items.label: Simple Key #2
items.description: Found in Sinner's Road.

items.label: Simple Key #3
items.description: Purchased from Jubilana in Merchant Enclave.

items.label: Simple Key #4
items.description: Found near the Coral Bench.

items.label: Gate Key
items.description: Found and used in the Deep Docks.

items.label: White Key
items.description: Found at the far right edge of Songclave.

items.label: Surgeon's Key
items.description: Found on the corpse of a Surgeon in the Whiteward.

items.label: Key of Apostate
items.description: Found in the Putrified Ducts region.

items.label: Key of Indolent
items.description: Found and used in the Slab.

items.label: Key of Heretic
items.description: Found and used in the Slab.

items.label: Architect's Key
items.description: Purchased from the Twelfth Architect.

label: Memory Lockets
desc: Special collectibles found throughout Pharloom that preserve memories of those who came before.

items.label: Memory Locket 1
items.description: The Marrow, northeast of the Bellway station

items.label: Memory Locket 2
items.description: Hunter's March, below the Chapel of the Beast

items.label: Memory Locket 3
items.description: Purchased from Mort in Far Fields for 150 rosaries, or from Grindle in Blasted Steps for 250 rosaries if not purchased before Act 3 begins

items.label: Memory Locket 4
items.description: West of the Greymoor Bellway

items.label: Memory Locket 5
items.description: Bone Bottom, awarded after completing the Volatile Flintbeetles Wish

items.label: Memory Locket 6
items.description: Purchased from Frey in Bellhart for  330  Rosaries

items.label: Memory Locket 7
items.description: Blasted Steps

items.label: Memory Locket 8
items.description: Southwest Wormways

items.label: Memory Locket 9
items.description: Bilewater, in a hidden room northwest of the Bellway

items.label: Memory Locket 10
items.description: Above the Grand Bellway, accessed from Exhaust Organ

items.label: Memory Locket 11
items.description: Underworks, west of the benches by the confessional

items.label: Memory Locket 12
items.description: Deep Docks, west of the diving bell

items.label: Memory Locket 13
items.description: Whispering Vaults, below the exit to the outside area

items.label: Memory Locket 14
items.description: Southwest Sands of Karak

items.label: Memory Locket 15
items.description: Inside of Halfway Home, above the left-hand door

items.label: Memory Locket 16
items.description: In the central area of the Memorium

items.label: Memory Locket 17
items.description: The Slab, in the shortcut cave between the Bellway area and the upper areas

items.label: Memory Locket 18
items.description: Bilewater, held by a corpse in a breakable cocoon just west of the hidden bench. Not visible until the cocoon is broken.

items.label: Memory Locket 19
items.description: Bellhart, above the Bellhome

items.label: Memory Locket 20
items.description: Far Fields, east of Skarrsinger Karmelita

label: Pale Oils
desc: Special refined oils found across Pharloom, often tied to rare quests or hidden vaults.

items.label: Vaults Pale Oil
items.description: Located in northeast Choral Chambers, accessed through the adjoining room in Whispering Vaults

items.label: Citadel Pale Oil
items.description: Reward for completing the 'Great Taste of Pharloom' Wish.

items.label: Flea Games Pale Oil
items.description: Reward for completing the 'Ecstasy of the End' Wish.

label: Craft Metals
desc: Refined metals used for crafting and upgrading tools throughout Pharloom.

items.label: Craft Metal
items.description: Bought from Pebb in Bone Bottom for 60 Rosaries.

items.label: Craft Metal
items.description: Found by exploding a tunnel of rock in the northeast area of the Marrow, in the large room west of the entrance to Hunter's March.

items.label: Craft Metal
items.description: Found in a chest behind the locked door in Deep Docks. It is located at the southwest corner of the bottom-most room that connects to Far Fields. (It is closer to the Far Fields Bellway Station than the Deep Docks Bellway Station.)

items.label: Craft Metal
items.description: Found in the Blasted Steps in a hidden area in the room before the Last Judge by falling down a hole at the east side of the room.

items.label: Craft Metal
items.description: Bought from Jubilana in Songclave for 180 Rosaries after completing the 'The Lost Merchant' Wish.

items.label: Craft Metal
items.description: Found behind a breakable ceiling in Wisp Thicket.

items.label: Craft Metal
items.description: Found at the end of a tunnel in the eastern Underworks, directly south of where Clawline can be found.

items.label: Craft Metal
items.description: Found at the far eastern end of the Pale Lake in Putrified Ducts.
